description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Berry Cordial recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mixed Berry Cordial Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, pour 1/4 cup of the berry cordial into each glass. Top with chilled soda water, lemonade or sparkling white wine. Add ice and fresh mint sprigs to garnish.
